com.gemalto.idp.mobile.fasttrack

Class FastTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.fasttrack.FastTrack

  • public abstract class FastTrack
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the entry-point of the Mobile Protector and Mobile Secure Messenger. It takes the configurations needed for different modules and provides the shared functionality.

    Refer to DefaultSettings for the default settings for FastTrack

    Since:
    5.3.0

      • getInstance

      • isConfigured

        public static boolean isConfigured()
        Check if the library has been configured previously.
        Returns:
        true if it has been configured, false otherwise

      • getOathMobileProtectorBuilder

        public abstract OathMobileProtector.Builder getOathMobileProtectorBuilder(@NonNull
                                                                          java.net.URL epsURL,
                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                          java.lang.String epsDomain,
                                                                          @NonNull
                                                                          MobileProtector.ProvisioningProtocol protocol,
                                                                          @NonNull
                                                                          java.lang.String rsaKeyId,
                                                                          @NonNull
                                                                          byte[] rsaKeyExponent,
                                                                          @NonNull
                                                                          byte[] rsaKeyModulus)
        Initialize Oath protector builder with mandatory configurations.
        Parameters:
        epsURL - the URL of the Enrollment API endpoint, e.g.
        • http(s)://[host]:[port]/EnrolmentServlet/GetAppCredentials for EPS 1.x
        • http(s)://[host]:[port]/provisioner/api/provisioning/pp for EPS 2.x
        • http(s)://[host]:[port]/provisioner/provision for EPS 3.x
        epsDomain - This domain can only be use when the provisioningProtocol set to MobileProtector.ProvisioningProtocol.PROTOCOL_V5 and above as well as when EPS that is being use is version 3 and above. Otherwise, this domain can be put null or empty.
        protocol - ProvisioningProtocol version
        rsaKeyId - RSA publicKey ID
        rsaKeyExponent - The server's RSA key exponent value
        rsaKeyModulus - The server's RSA key modulus value
        Returns:
        Oath protector builder

      • getOathMobileProtectorInstance

        public abstract OathMobileProtector getOathMobileProtectorInstance()
        Get the OathMobileProtector instance. This function can be called after constructing the object using OathMobileProtector.Builder otherwise will throws RuntimeException.
        Returns:
        OathMobileProtector

      • getCapMobileProtectorBuilder

        public abstract CapMobileProtector.Builder getCapMobileProtectorBuilder(@NonNull
                                                                        java.net.URL epsURL,
                                                                        @Nullable
                                                                        java.lang.String epsDomain,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        MobileProtector.ProvisioningProtocol protocol,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        java.lang.String rsaKeyId,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        byte[] rsaKeyExponent,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        byte[] rsaKeyModulus)
        Initialize Cap protector builder with mandatory configurations.
        Parameters:
        epsURL - The URL of the Enrollment API endpoint, e.g.
        • http(s)://[host]:[port]/EnrolmentServlet/GetAppCredentials for EPS 1.x
        • http(s)://[host]:[port]/provisioner/api/provisioning/pp for EPS 2.x
        • http(s)://[host]:[port]/provisioner/provision for EPS 3.x
        epsDomain - This domain can only be used when the protocol is set to MobileProtector.ProvisioningProtocol.PROTOCOL_V5 and above as well as when the EPS that is being used is version 3 and above. Otherwise, this domain can be put null or empty.
        protocol - Provisioning protocol version.
        rsaKeyId - The server's RSA public key id.
        rsaKeyExponent - The server's RSA key exponent value.
        rsaKeyModulus - The server's RSA key modulus value.
        Returns:
        Cap protector builder

      • getCapMobileProtectorInstance

        public abstract CapMobileProtector getCapMobileProtectorInstance()
        Get the CapMobileProtector instance. This function can be called after constructing the object using CapMobileProtector.Builder otherwise will throws RuntimeException.
        Returns:
        CapMobileProtector

      • getMobileMessengerBuilder

        public abstract MobileMessenger.Builder getMobileMessengerBuilder(@NonNull
                                                                  java.net.URL oobUrl,
                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                  java.lang.String domain,
                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                  java.lang.String applicationId,
                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                  byte[] rsaExponent,
                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                  byte[] rsaModulus)
        Initialize the Messenger builder with mandatory configurations.
        Parameters:
        oobUrl - the URL of the OOB server.
        domain - the domain to use for requests to the OOB server. It must be compliant with server configuration on back-end side.
        applicationId - the application identifier to use for requests to the OOB server.
        rsaExponent - the RSA public exponent to use to communicate with the OOB server.
        rsaModulus - the RSA modules to use to communicate with the OOB server.
        Returns:
        builder object to construct MobileMessenger.

      • getMobileMessengerInstance

        public abstract MobileMessenger getMobileMessengerInstance()
        Get the MobileMessenger instance.
        Returns:
        MobileMessenger

        Get the root status of the physical device.
